title: how to get RP free
body:
hi i am a new player form hong knog
i have played tw server for a long time . in tw server i can get some rp when i started the first time to play it . can i get it in NA server also ?

replies.body:
As *Wolfess* mentioned, we've retired the 400 RP promo and moved onto Hextech Crafting Box & Key promos for new players at level 5. You can find our official announcement post [here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)

Let me know if you have any questions.

They no longer give starting players 400 RP, instead they get a hextech crafting chest with a random skin, random ward skin, and enough orange essence to craft at least one of them (which was I think 800 orange essence.. or 600. I forget)

it's there most likely to stop people from making spam accounts and gifting their main ones all the cheapest skins immediately.
